response.overview: Tamlyn Tomita stars as a concerned mother in this very dramatic film about raising an Olympian. Well acted by her and the cast there is so much rift between the daughter and Mom it is very good at instigated her Olympic dreams further. With the passion to do better in life, the daughter has to pull through her medical treatments and be heroine for so many people.  Watch it on Montageplay.com streaming platform
response.title: Seppuku
